visual_desc: THRONE ROOM - WIDE SHOT. The hall is suffocatingly dark, draped in heavy black fabrics that absorb all natural light. Hundreds of black candles provide the only illumination, casting long, dancing shadows and a rich, deep chiaroscuro across the cavernous space. The stone throne is harsh. <Morgath> sits upon it, wearing the spiked crown of black iron thorns. Her fitted black gown contrasts sharply with the occasional flicker of firelight reflected in her pale skin and dark eyes. Beside the throne, a gilded crib rests on the stone floor. Inside, the infant <Prince Cael> sleeps peacefully, swaddled in fine white cloth. The royal banners are gone, replaced by flags bearing Morgath’s dark crimson embroidery. The overall texture is cold stone and melting wax.
variation_reason: Compared to the first frame, there are only minor changes—specifically the subtle, continuous flickering of the candlelight causing dancing shadows. The camera and the main subjects remain entirely static, reflecting a captured moment of stillness under ominous lighting.
ff_desc: A photorealistic medieval fantasy wide shot of a throne room, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses. The hall is suffocatingly dark, draped in heavy black fabrics that absorb all natural light. Hundreds of black candles provide the only illumination, emphasizing rich, deep chiaroscuro shadows across the cavernous space. The stone throne appears harsh. The woman with long straight raven-black hair, wearing a spiked crown of black iron thorns and a fitted black gown, sits upon it. Her pale skin and dark eyes occasionally catch the flickering firelight. Beside the throne rests a gilded crib on the stone floor, inside which the infant with fine white cloth swaddling lies sleeping peacefully. Royal banners are replaced by flags bearing dark crimson embroidery. The visual texture is predominantly cold stone and melting wax.
lf_desc: A photorealistic medieval fantasy wide shot of a throne room, shot on Arri Alexa 65 with Panavision anamorphic lenses. The hall remains suffocatingly dark, draped in heavy black fabrics. Hundreds of black candles cast long, dancing shadows and deep chiaroscuro. The stone throne is harsh. The woman with long straight raven-black hair and the thin crown of black iron thorns sits upon it, her fitted black gown stark against her porcelain-pale skin. The gilded crib still rests beside the throne on the stone floor, where the infant Prince Cael remains sleeping peacefully, swaddled in fine white cloth. The mood is cold stone and melting wax, with dark crimson embroidered flags visible in the background.
motion_desc: The camera is static throughout the shot. The woman with long straight raven-black hair, wearing the spiked crown, remains seated on the throne. The only internal motion is the subtle, rhythmic flickering of the hundreds of black candles throughout the space, causing the long shadows cast across the stone environment and the woman's pale skin to dance slightly. The ambient sound consists of the soft hiss and crackle of melting wax and burning wicks, accompanied by a low, non-rhythmic, dissonant cello drone underscore, augmenting the unsettling atmosphere.
audio_desc: [Sound Effect] Faint, sharp flicker and crackle of hundreds of black candles in oppressive silence. [Score cue] Deep, sustained, low drone beginning.
